description:
All Offers Presented ON OR BEFORE 6:00pm Tuesday January 31st
(the seller reserves the right to sell prior to the end date)

If you're searching for a sizable family home with plenty of room for your expanding family, quality finishes from top to bottom - but also desire a low maintenance lifestyle - Your search could be over at 47 Millstream Drive, Southern River!

Located opposite the picturesque Walkingdale Promenade Nature Reserve and within only moments to the lake, filled with the sounds of singing water birds and lush bushlands, this property places you in a quiet yet convenient position with everything on your doorstep, from popular shops, reputable schools, lush parklands and more – Why should you compromise?

Perched on a generous 510sqm block, surrounded by quality homes and friendly neighbours, this home offers 4 good sized bedrooms, 2 bathrooms and multiple living areas for any occasion in a prime and sought-after location.

Beyond the striking double-door entrance lies a sprawling floorplan with lofty recessed ceilings that add a touch of class. Designed to offer a great separation of living areas, with a thoughtful combination of formal and informal living including a home theatre room to sit back and enjoy your favourite movies in, as well as a dedicated kids activity room.

The super spacious master bedroom is elegantly finished with fresh, neutral grey tones, boasting a large walk-in robe, sumptuous carpets underfoot and a resort style ensuite bathroom. The ensuite offers the ultimate indulgence, finished with a luxurious corner spa bath to relax and soak away your worries, a spacious shower, an extended benchtop + mirror, double vessel sinks, an abundance of storage, and a separate toilet. The minor bedrooms are all located in a separate wing of the home, all are good sizes with built-in robes and share a well-equipped family bathroom that is ready to tackle the early morning rush with ease.

The heart of the home is the open plan living and dining area that brings everyone back together for some quality family time and to enjoy a meal. With plenty of natural light being cast through numerous windows - you'll never feel like the walls are creeping in on you. The well-appointed kitchen overlooks the open plan living areas and is central to all the action! With ample benchtop space for the budding MasterChef in the home to prepare meals, a freestanding oven and gas cooktop with a complementary stainless steel rangehood and dishwasher, a double fridge recess and generous storage.

When it comes to outdoor entertaining, there is a seamless connection from the inside out to the covered alfresco area. This space feels private and secure while offering the ultimate in low maintenance living and the perfect place to entertain family and friends. Finished with extended wrap around paving and fuss free raised garden beds, neatly framed with solid railway sleepers.

SCHOOL CATCHMENT
Bletchley Park Primary School (300m)
Canning Vale College (2.8km)
Harrisdale Senior High School (3.1km)

RATES
Council: TBA
Water:$1209

FEATURES
* 4 Bedrooms & 2 Bathrooms
* Home theatre with a pull-down projector screen
* Activity room
* Open plan living area with gas bayonet point
* Well equipped kitchen with quality cooking appliances
* Feature pendant lighting in the lounge, dining, and activity room
* Laundry with extended worktop and generous storage
* Ducted air conditioning throughout, plus multiple split system units
* Covered alfresco area under the main roof
* Spacious paved courtyard with a side access gate
* Extended driveway for extra parking
* Double lock up garage
* Security screens and doors
* Built in Approx. 2007
* Land Approx. 510sqm / Build Approx. 221sqm

LIFESTYLE
140m – Sandmartin Reserve
160m - Walkingdale Promenade Reserve
1km – Coles Southern River
1.4km – Gosnells Golf Club
2km - Vale Shopping Centre,
3.2km - Southern River shops,

*PLEASE NOTE: While every effort has been made to ensure the given information is correct at the time of listing, this information is provided for reference only and is subject to enquiry.
